attributes.action: Allow the wearing of the Burkha in Britian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Muslim Women should be allowed to have freedom of expression in Britian and that includes clothing such as the burkha. In order to live well we should show respect to each other. The fact that muslim women continue to go with their heads raised to work and around town shows great courage, which should be rewarded and not punished.

rejection.details: Women are already allowed to wear the Burkha in Britian
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
